projects.title: Clustering Analysis
projects.description: Aim:Comparative analysis of all the popular clustering algorithms on the dataset "Diabetes 130-US hospitals for years 1999-2008"â€¢Kmeans ,KMeDoids Clustering Algorithm was successfully implemented and the results were compared using Silhouette Coefficientâ€¢An agglomerative hierarchical clustering (AHC) algorithm with a bottom up approach was used to separate clinically appropriate clusters

projects.title: Artificial neural network for Fuel consumption prediction of tractor
projects.description: Objective - to develop different neural network models and to compare their performance and predict the best model â€¢ Linear Regression , backpropagation neural network .levenberg marqudid algorithm and radial basis function were used to train the dataset â€¢ It was found that the best results were obtained by using Radial basis function (RBF) with a r2_score of .95 and mse was 0.003
